randomfill

randomfill from node that works in the browser. In node you just get crypto.randomBytes, but in the browser it uses .crypto/msCrypto.getRandomValues

js var randomFill = require('randomfill'); var buf randomFill.randomFillSync(16);//get 16 random bytes randomFill.randomFill(16, function (err, resp) { // resp is 16 random bytes });
